body:
I haven't use LiteIDE but I am fairly sure that it uses https://github.com/nsf/gocode for autocompletion. You need to update it to the latest version to be able to use with Go 1.7:

    go get -u github.com/nsf/gocode

You might also try using https://github.com/mdempsky/gocode instead.

I suggest to report this issue on LiteIDE bug tracker.
